title: GUARDIANS OF THE CHOSEN: ANGEL ARMIES
description: Interlocking lives. One extraordinary adventure.Guardians of the Chosen (Angel Armies) centres around the Teakshire Woods community torn between the very different worlds of good and evil. With heart-stopping thrilling action, families encounter grotesque ruthless enemies, stalking them at every turn.Amid danger, violence, and fierce battles, three very special children, The Chosen, fight an invisible war, that demands their courage and endurance.They become the key to unexpected, miraculous encounters, embracing hope and love, giving a vivid portrayal of the power of redemption.
author: Robin Daniel Chellaswamy
